title: [LFP] Need a buddy
body:
I've become rather lonely playing league and id like to make a friend to duo with. I play mostly normals because i love tank/support junglers and its impossible to play those types of champs in ranked but maybe if i had a decent duo partner id play ranked. id prefer if you had skype or discord but in all honesty as long as youre a cool and chill person it doesnt bother me if you cant talk.

Im not looking for someone to play one or two games im actually trying to find someone who could be a good friend so if youre just gonna play a couple of games and leave dont bother.

Add me in-game if you wanna chat!

See you on the rift,
ConnTroller

replies.body: Is there a rank pref your looking for? e.g bronze,silver,etc.
i dont really play ranked so not really but i guess anywhere from bronze to low gold would be pretty chill
I guess you could trial out with me in norms and see the synergy.

Right tomorrow I'll hope on and hopefully I'll catch you.

Btw my Skype if you need : Gavinnofree
Hi I'm Platinum V, a youtuber, and I'm always looking for friends; wanna add me ingame? :)
